author: wschwab
content: If I just fired up a validator, should I be expecting to wait in queue before publishing attestations every block?

author: wschwab
content: (I am right that a validator should be publishing attestations every block, no?)

author: protolambda
content: After deposit you have to wait for the deposit to be inserted in the eth2 chain, and then wait for activation. This may take a few hours

author: protolambda
content: And a validator attests every epoch, i.e. every 32 slots it is assigned participate in a random committee

author: wschwab
content: Aha, that clears things up for me. Thanks!

author: notmcd

author: wschwab
content: Just published a guide for validating on Witti using Nethermind for Goerli, and Lighthouse for Witti: https://medium.com/nethermind-eth/using-nethermind-to-run-a-validator-in-eth2-5c227653e197
